keyMappings:
unmapAll

# left hand
map b togglePinTab
map y reload hard
map o scrollPageUp
map u reload
map ' focusInput
map i previousTab
map e scrollPageDown
map a nextTab
map , createTab
map g restoreTab
map x removeTab
map j copyCurrentUrl
map k duplicateTab

map й togglePinTab
map ц reload hard
map у scrollPageUp
map к reload
map е focusInput
map ы previousTab
map в scrollPageDown
map а nextTab
map п createTab
map я restoreTab
map ч removeTab
map с copyCurrentUrl
map м duplicateTab

# right hand
map d scrollPageUp
map t scrollPageDown
map h previousTab
map s nextTab
map . goBack
map n goForward
map r scrollUp
map m scrollDown
map f toggleMuteTab
map p showHelp
map " Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map w Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map q visitPreviousTab
map l Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=b
map ? enterFindMode

map ш scrollPageUp
map л scrollPageDown
map о previousTab
map д nextTab
map р goBack
map ж goForward
map ь scrollUp
map б scrollDown
map ю toggleMuteTab
map н Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map щ Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map э visitPreviousTab
map г Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=b
map т enterFindMode

# scroll with arrows
map <up> scrollUp
map <down> scrollDown
map <left> scrollUp
map <right> scrollDown

# navigate search results
map { performFind
map } performBackwardsFind
map х performFind
map ъ performBackwardsFind

map 1 moveTabLeft
map 3 moveTabRight

map <space> scrollPageDown
map <enter> LinkHints.activateMode

map <backspace><enter> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <backspace><backspace> scrollToTop
map <backspace><space> scrollToBottom

# custom shortcuts
map T createTab https://translate.google.com/
map E createTab https://www.youtube.com/
map A createTab https://leetcode.com/problem-list/top-interview-questions/?sorting=W3sic29ydE9yZGVyIjoiQVNDRU5ESU5HIiwib3JkZXJCeSI6IkRJRkZJQ1VMVFkifV0%3D&page=1
map I createTab https://excalidraw.com/
map H createTab https://radio.garden/listen/systrumsistumssr1/A7e8_nXI

map Л createTab https://translate.google.com/
map В createTab https://www.youtube.com/
map А createTab https://leetcode.com/problem-list/top-interview-questions/?sorting=W3sic29ydE9yZGVyIjoiQVNDRU5ESU5HIiwib3JkZXJCeSI6IkRJRkZJQ1VMVFkifV0%3D&page=1
map Ы createTab https://excalidraw.com/
map О createTab https://radio.garden/listen/systrumsistumssr1/A7e8_nXI
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
#d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
b: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Search the web
